intro: The v-pagination component is used to separate long sets of data so that it is easier for a user to consume information. Depending on the length provided, the pagination component will automatically scale. To maintain the current page, simply supply a v-model attribute.

circle.heading: Circle
circle.intro: The circle prop gives you an alternate style for pagination buttons.

length.heading: Length
length.intro: Using the length prop you can set the length of v-pagination, if the number of page buttons exceeds the parent container, it will truncate the list.

total.heading: Total visible
total.intro: You can also manually set the maximum number of visible page buttons with the total-visible prop.
